code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with 4 weeks history of mild malaise, mild sore throat and mild cough. pt is a f aged 66 ys. she smokes a pack/day for 5 years patient has a history of excessive levels of alcohol consumption o:Height 157 cm, Weight 57.8 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 14, HEENT: WNL, Cough present during interview with sputum production, all lung fields, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Bronchitis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Guaifenesin - 600 mg by mouth daily, and ordered CBC, Pulse Oximetry, RSV Antigen.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination
